SELECT * FROM (SELECT bc.trade_no_xgxy, u.real_name, u.user_name AS account, cb.status, bc.repay_amount AS repaid_amount, (bc.amount + bc.interest_amount + bc.sum_repaid_interest + bc.poundage_amount + bc.sum_repaid_poundage + bc.overdue_amount + bc.sum_repaid_overdue - bc.repay_amount) AS unrepay_amount, bc.gmt_plan_repayment AS gmt_due, bc.overdue_day AS overdue_days, MAX(bcr.gmt_create) AS gmt_last_repay, bc.overdue_amount AS reducible_amount, (bc.amount + bc.interest_amount + bc.sum_repaid_interest + bc.poundage_amount + bc.sum_repaid_poundage + bc.overdue_amount + bc.sum_repaid_overdue - bc.repay_amount - bc.overdue_amount) AS un_reducible_amount, (bc.amount + bc.interest_amount + bc.sum_repaid_interest + bc.poundage_amount + bc.sum_repaid_poundage + bc.overdue_amount + bc.sum_repaid_overdue - bc.repay_amount)/bc.overdue_amount AS reducibleRate FROM jsd_collection_borrow cb INNER JOIN jsd_borrow_cash bc ON cb.borrow_id = bc.id INNER JOIN jsd_user u ON bc.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN jsd_borrow_cash_repayment bcr ON cb.borrow_id = bcr.borrow_id WHERE cb.is_delete = 0
AND cb.status = #{status}
AND (bc.trade_no_xgxy LIKE '${searchContent}%' OR u.real_name LIKE '%${searchContent}%')
GROUP BY bc.trade_no_xgxy ORDER BY cb.id DESC) s

SELECT SUM(b.amount + b.interest_amount + b.sum_repaid_interest + b.poundage_amount + b.sum_repaid_poundage + b.overdue_amount + b.sum_repaid_overdue) FROM jsd_collection_borrow a INNER JOIN jsd_borrow_cash b ON a.borrow_id = b.id AND (a.gmt_create BETWEEN #{dateStart} AND #{dateEnd}) AND a.is_delete = 0
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM jsd_collection_borrow WHERE status = 'WAIT_FINISH' AND is_delete = 0
